casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

June 19, 2014

[Cite as 06/19/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Qhio-2635.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-0090. State ex rel. Evans v. Marshall.

In Mandamus and Procedendo. This cause came on for further consideration upon the filing of relator’s request for findings of fact and conclusions of law pursuant to Civ.R. 52. It is ordered by the court that the request is denied.
